text: Andalouse may refer to: *Sauce andalouse, a Belgian specialty sauce *Les Andalouses, a location near Aïn El Turk ==Music== *Andalouse, Émile Pessard arr. Robert Neil Cavally *Sérénade andalouse, Op. 28 by Pablo de Sarasate *Sérénade andalouse, music by C. Ruecker for La Argentina *"Andalouse" (Kendji Girac song), a 2014 song by French singer Kendji Girac
title: Andalouse
